prompt_template:
⚠️ IMPORTANT: NO launch swarms on this session - Do not invoke agents or use multiple threading to prevent hang-ups from thread management failures.

Work on the next pending task(s) for spec {spec_name}. You may work on multiple tasks at once if they are similar, related, or beneficial to complete together. When you complete a logical unit of work, you MUST run 'git add' followed by 'git commit' with a clear message. DO NOT just stage files - you must actually commit them. DO NOT ask permission - just commit immediately when work is done. Make atomic commits for each semantic group of changes.
